column4: ok so I just happen to find an official packaged ubuntu version 5.10 with live cd and install cd. how easy is that to upgrade to dapper? maybe it would be better to download a newer dapper cd image and burn it with Nero, then do the install?  any recommednations or thoughts?
is the dist-upgrade to 6.06 easy or a pain in the ass that would be avoided by just downloading the dapper to start with
